CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 10, 1962, pg. 24 reads: "Big Hit - One of the favorites at the Dapper Dan banquet was Sandy Stevens, All America quarterback from Minnesota and a native of Uniontown, Pa. Stephens is shown with the Hon. John G. Brosky, general chairman of the banquet...-All Photos by Harris"
TitMainTitle: Sandy Stevens, All-America quarterback from Minnesota, and the Hon. John G. Brosky, chairman of the Dapper Dan banquet, standing in Kings Garden, Hilton Hotel for Dapper Dan banquet
